title: Fix Modal Scroll Container - Duplicate Close Tag
description: The modal-scroll-container was being closed twice (line 1077 has two consecutive tags), causing the tab panels to not display correctly. This breaks the layout and causes content overlap. Root cause: Extra closing tag left from refactoring.
reasoning: UX Issue: Tab content overlapping and not displaying correctly in admin modal
HTML Structure Bug: modal-scroll-container closed twice (line ~1077)
Symptom: Second closes container prematurely, breaking flex layout
Result: Modal footer appears in wrong position, tabs not scrollable properly
Root Cause: During Whitelabel tab insertion, extra closing was not removed

testCases.name: Modal displays all tabs correctly
steps: 1. Open dashboard and click admin button
2. Verify tabs: Business Units, Applications, Applications Overview, Whitelabel, Settings
3. Click each tab and verify content displays without overlap
4. Content should be inside scrollable container
5. Modal footer should be at bottom
testCases.expectedResult: All tabs display correctly with proper spacing, no content overlap

testCases.name: Modal scroll container is functional
steps: 1. Open Applications tab with many apps
2. Content should scroll within modal, not page
3. Modal footer stays fixed at bottom
4. No 'Global Settings' text visible at bottom when scrolled
testCases.expectedResult: Proper scrolling behavior within modal container

rollbackPlan: Restore the duplicate tag if needed: change line 1077 from single back to double
